author: Wayne Collins
description: Tames bourbon and adds hints of apricot, vanilla and apple.
name: Kentucky Dream
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: STIR vanilla liqueur and bitters with two ice cubes in a glass
Add half the bourbon and two more ice cubes
Stir some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the bourbon
Add the last two ingredients and more ice cubes and stir lots more
The melting and stirring of the ice cubes is essential to the dilution and taste of the drink
